description: 1.5 liter bottles, for drinking and cooking!
Fruit and vegetable juices, 1 liter sweetened drinks
Canned vegetables e.g. (corn, tomatoes, mushrooms, peas and carrots) (approx. 300 g)
Apple sauce, canned pineapple or dried fruit, e.g. (approx. 300 g)
Tomato sauce, pesto, ketchup, mayonnaise, mustard, e.g. (approx. 200 g)
Bouillon cubes, ready-to-eat and freeze-dried soups with tomatoes, vermicelli, e.g. (approx. 200 g)
Pasta, rice, rice cakes, muesli, e.g., or gluten-free alternative (approx. 500 g)
Chickpeas, beans in tomato sauce, canned or dried lentils, e.g. (approx. 400 g)
Dried meat, cured ham, salami, canned Italian cheese (approx. 100 g)
Cereal bars, sweet foods, chocolate (limit to 200-400kcal per day)
